reuters.title: FTSE 100 share index opens 136.9 points down at 2,165 - London Stock Exchange
reuters.body: Third quarter ended August 31 Group shr 34.92 yen vs 34.74 Group shr per ADS 69.84 vs 69.48 Net 4.20 billion vs 4.18 billion Pretax 10.30 billion vs 9.73 billion Sales 95.96 billion vs 92.59 billion Company's full name is TDK Corp <TDK.T> REUTER 
